s.text: The aforementioned anomalous success of the Marine Corps suggests a politically sensitive cause that the Times doesn't mention: the feminization of the military hasn't made it that much more appealing to women but has made it much less special-seeming to men.

The aforementioned anomalous success of the Marine Corps suggests a politically sensitive cause that the Times doesn't mention: the feminization of the military hasn't made it that much more appealing to women but has made it much less special-seeming to men.
A fairer statement is that the speech helped make the topic a serious part of the national conversation.
